mapper.insert: insert into f_coin_balance ( fid, fdate, fcoinid, fbalance, fcreatedate, fremark, version ) values ( #{fid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{fcoinid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fbalance,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{fcreatedate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{fremark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER})
